title: Get TDD Working and testing all blur and update functions
description: Implement comprehensive tests for all edit functions and onBlur handlers in the Tasks repository. This ensures that all database updates occur correctly when fields are edited and blurred.
verificationSteps: 1. Test each edit function to verify it allows editing of task fields
2. Verify that each onBlur handler correctly updates the database
3. Create comprehensive tests based on existing documentation
4. Run tests and identify functions that do not work as intended
5. Document all issues found during testing
nextSteps: Add tests for inline editing functionality in TaskCard
Add tests for EditableItemList onBlur database updates
